title: Is a $130 Laptop Worth It?
description: For less than $200 it's hard to find a better laptop than this. Dell Inspiron 11 3180 on Amazon:  Is a $700 Gaming Laptop Worth It?   By using our Amazon affiliate links, you help to support the channel as we may receive compensation for purchases through those links.  Subscribe!  Instagram:  Twitter:
